title: Aged 16 to 64 years level 3 or above qualifications

versions.title: Aged 16 to 64 years level 3 or above qualifications
versions.summary: Percentage of the population aged 16 to 64 with National Vocational Qualification (NVQ) level 3+ qualifications, Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), 2004 to 2021
versions.description: This dataset shows the percentage of the population aged 16 to 64 with National Vocational Qualification (NVQ) level 3+ qualifications, in Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), for 2004 - 2021.
